channel.title: Php Community Bush Politics Politic Hiromi Google Friendster on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Php Community Bush Politics Politic Hiromi Google Friendster on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: i am a fan of the community networks
item.description: it is true. recently a google employees side/personal project relaly took off. orkut is honestly what I felt friendster could have been . it doesn’t limit communication to on site. it lets you see the contact info for all your friends and maintain some form of community without limiting yourself to some shoddy infrastructure. I really like how you can create sub groups among your friends, create/be apart of a larger overall subgroup and rate your friends.
